content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_python_code" command to calculate the area of a circle with a radius of 5. When I used the "google" command, I received a list of articles on the legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace. In addition, I used the "list_files" command and received a list of files in the current directory, including "circle_area.py" which was likely used to calculate the circle area. I used the "read_file" command to access the "legal_research_resources.txt" file and received a list of legal research resources from various sources, including Harvard Law School Library, Texas State Law Library, and the United Nations.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.americanbar.org/groups/labor_law/publications/labor_employment_law_news/spring-2022/ai-in-the-workplace/", "https://hbr.org/2019/04/the-legal-and-ethical-implications-of-using-ai-in-hiring", "https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fsurg.2022.862322/full", "https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2016/10/top-10-ethical-issues-in-artificial-intelligence/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8963864/", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666659620300056", "https://frostbrowntodd.com/the-use-and-legal-ramifications-of-artificial-intelligence-entering-the-workforce/", "https://news.bloomberglaw.com/us-law-week/employers-should-consider-these-risks-when-employees-use-chatgpt"]', type='action_result')]
"""
